item.title: How to write the simplest trading strategy using Spreads
item.description: I am always amused when retail traders are offered and then do use black boxes with complex frameworks to build automatic trading strategies. Usually, that goes with an explanation how cool those platforms are and how easy to build a strategy using them. They forget about vendor lock-in and the most terrible model of shared state with events hell like “OnData”, “OnOrder”, “OnBarOpen”, “OnBarClose”, etc. The more I talk with people, the more I realize that CEP is the approach that desks and serious traders use.
